com.alexkasko.unsafe.offheappayload
Class OffHeapPayloadSorter

java.lang.Object
  com.alexkasko.unsafe.offheappayload.OffHeapPayloadSorter
Deprecated. 

@Deprecated
public class OffHeapPayloadSorter
extends Object

alexkasko: borrowed from https://android.googlesource.com/platform/libcore/+/android-4.2.2_r1/luni/src/main/java/java/util/DualPivotQuicksort.java and adapted to OffHeapPayloadAddressable. This class implements the Dual-Pivot Quicksort algorithm by Vladimir Yaroslavskiy, Jon Bentley, and Joshua Bloch. The algorithm offers O(n log(n)) performance on many data sets that cause other quicksorts to degrade to quadratic performance, and is typically faster than traditional (one-pivot) Quicksort implementations.

Version:
2009.11.29 m765.827.12i
Author:
Vladimir Yaroslavskiy, Jon Bentley, Josh Bloch

Method Detail

sort

public static void sort(OffHeapPayloadAddressable a)
Deprecated. 
Sorts the specified off-heap header-payload collection into ascending order.

Parameters:
a - the off-heap header-payload collection to be sorted

sort

public static void sort(OffHeapPayloadAddressable a,
                        long fromIndex,
                        long toIndex)
Deprecated. 
Sorts the specified range of the off-heap header-payload collection into ascending order. The range to be sorted extends from the index fromIndex, inclusive, to the index toIndex, exclusive. If fromIndex == toIndex, the range to be sorted is empty (and the call is a no-op).

Parameters:
a - the off-heap header-payload collection to be sorted
fromIndex - the index of the first element, inclusive, to be sorted
toIndex - the index of the last element, exclusive, to be sorted
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - if (fromIndex < 0 || fromIndex > toIndex || toIndex > a.size())

doSort

private static void doSort(OffHeapPayloadAddressable a,
                           long left,
                           long right,
                           byte[] pi,
                           byte[] pj,
                           byte[] pe1,
                           byte[] pe2,
                           byte[] pe3,
                           byte[] pe4,
                           byte[] pe5)
Deprecated. 
Sorts the specified range of the off-heap header-payload collection into ascending order. This method differs from the public sort method in that the right index is inclusive, and it does no range checking on left or right.

Parameters:
a - the off-heap header-payload collection to be sorted
left - the index of the first element, inclusive, to be sorted
right - the index of the last element, inclusive, to be sorted

Deprecated. 
Sorts the specified range of the off-heap header-payload collection into ascending order by the Dual-Pivot Quicksort algorithm.

Parameters:
a - the off-heap header-payload collection to be sorted
left - the index of the first element, inclusive, to be sorted
right - the index of the last element, inclusive, to be sorted
